game.name: Devil May Cry 4 Special Edition
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 대성공을 거둔 스타일리시한 DMC4가 새로운 플레이 가능 캐릭터와 게임 모드를 자랑하며 전보다 개선된 상태로 돌아왔습니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The smash-hit stylish action game DMC4 is back and better than ever, boasting new playable characters and game modes!

reviewHighlights.text: Don't buy the game! there is unknown issue makes the game crash out and black screen or even doesn't run completely and turning off. it is still not f...
